CNearestPointExtrapolator.h

3 #pragma once
4 
5 #include <cmath>
6 
7 #include "Common/PDFUtils.h"
8 #include "Interface/IExtrapolator.h"
9 
10 namespace PDFxTMD
11 {
12 // Return the value in the given list that best matches the
13 // target value
14 inline double _findClosestMatch(const std::vector<double> &cands, double target)
15 {
16  auto it = std::lower_bound(cands.begin(), cands.end(), target);
17  const double upper = *it;
18  const double lower =
19  (it == cands.begin()) ? upper : *(--it); //< Avoid decrementing the first entry
21  if (std::fabs(target - upper) < std::fabs(target - lower))
22  return upper;
23  return lower;
24 }
25 
26 template <typename Reader, typename Interpolator>
27 class CNearestPointExtrapolator
28  : public IcAdvancedPDFExtrapolator<CNearestPointExtrapolator<Reader, Interpolator>, Reader,
29  Interpolator>
30 {
31  public:
32  double extrapolate(const IReader<Reader> *reader, PartonFlavor flavor, double x,
33  double mu) const
34  {
35  double q2 = mu * mu;
39  auto xVals = reader->getValues(PhaseSpaceComponent::X);
40  auto q2Vals = reader->getValues(PhaseSpaceComponent::Q2);
41 
42  const double closestX = (isInRangeX(*reader, x)) ? x : _findClosestMatch(xVals, x);
43  const double closestQ2 = (isInRangeQ2(*reader, q2)) ? q2 : _findClosestMatch(q2Vals, q2);
44  return this->m_interpolator->interpolate(flavor, closestX, closestQ2);
45  }
46 };
47 } // namespace PDFxTMD
